sections.title: Verse 1
content: Bless the Lord, oh my soul,
And never forget His gifts.

sections.title: Verse 2
content: Bless the Lord, oh my soul,
He pardons all our sins.

sections.title: Verse 3
content: Bless the Lord, oh my soul,
He saves us from all harm.

sections.title: Verse 4
content: Bless the Lord, oh my soul,
He fills our life with good.

sections.title: Verse 5
content: Bless the Lord, oh my soul,
He keeps us ever young.

sections.title: Verse 6
content: Bless the Lord, oh my soul,
His mercy never ends.

sections.title: Verse 7
content: Bless the Lord, oh my soul,
His kindness never ends.

sections.title: Verse 8
content: Bless the Lord, oh my soul,
He is the Bread of Life.

sections.title: Verse 9
content: Bless the Lord, oh my soul,
He died to bring us life.

sections.title: Verse 10
content: Bless the Lord, my soul,
He keeps His promises.

sections.title: Chorus
content: All of my life I will praise the living God,
My heart full of joy I will bless His Holy Name.
